name: Stone Creeper
description: A plant creature resembling a vine that can remain motionless and blend into its surroundings. It can climb surfaces easily and navigate narrow spaces.
memorable: Its ability to disguise itself as a common vine and its acid-injecting attacks make it a tricky foe.
goals: To ambush unsuspecting creatures and navigate its environment stealthily.
relations: May be found in conjunction with other ambush predators or plant creatures.
environment: Commonly found in forested or overgrown areas.
strengths: Immunity to acid and poison damage, resistant to bludgeoning damage.
weaknesses: Lower intelligence, wisdom, and charisma scores, limiting its tactical options.
attacks: Utilizes thorned vines for melee attacks and acid-coated thorns for ranged attacks, applying both piercing and acid damage.
most_powerful_ability: Weaken Stone - can collapse structures and entrap creatures beneath rubble.
senses: Has tremorsense within a 60-foot radius but is blind beyond that range.
additional_information: Can move through very narrow spaces without squeezing.
Can climb difficult surfaces, including ceilings, without checks.
Indistinguishable from ordinary vines when motionless.
test_queries: ambush predator that resembles a vine
plant creature that climbs and hides
creature immune to poison and acid damage
